entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
